page.title: 04ROADS SYSTEMS AND TRANSPORT
page.content: The main road that runs through Hardwick is called the A45 it runs through the centre of the block.On St Neots road there are two cafes,they're called the Little Chef and the Enterprize.The bus service for the area is Whippet Coaches.We have done a traffic survey looking at the traffic going east and west along the A45.We saw 852 vehicles altogether there were 531 cars 208 lorries 4 motor bikes 8 coaches and 101 van's.The other roads in the block are much smaller whith less traffic flow and run mainly north to south.Most of the traffic throgh Hardwick and Madingley is commuting to work in and out of Cambridge.Most of the A45 is by-passing Cambridge is tourist or buissness traffic.A45 links onto the M11 to London to Leeds and North.
